Class GameInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.game.GameInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameInfo extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the information of a game session, including details about the game identifier, associated game controller, maximum number of players, connected players, and game status. This class implements Serializable to allow its information to be transmitted or stored as required.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameInfo

      public GameInfo(String gameId, CallableOnGameController gameController, int maxPlayers, Map<String,PlayerColor> connectedPlayers, boolean isStarted, boolean isTestFlight)
      Constructs a new GameInfo instance with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gameId - a unique identifier for the game session
      gameController - the game controller associated with this game session, used for handling remote client calls
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players allowed in the game
      connectedPlayers - a map of currently connected players, where the key is the player's nickname and the value is their associated color
      isStarted - a flag indicating whether the game session has started
      isTestFlight - a flag indicating whether the game session is in test flight mode

    • GameInfo

      public GameInfo()
      Default constructor for the GameInfo class. Initializes an instance of GameInfo with default values for all fields.

      This constructor can be used to create an empty GameInfo object, allowing the properties to be set individually using setter methods.

  • Method Details

    • getConnectedPlayers

      public Map<String,PlayerColor> getConnectedPlayers()
      Retrieves the map of connected players where each entry maps a player's nickname to their associated PlayerColor.
      Returns:
      a map containing the nicknames of the connected players as keys and their associated PlayerColor as values.

    • setGameId

      public void setGameId(String gameId)
      Sets the unique identifier for the game session.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the unique identifier to be assigned to the game session

    • setMaxPlayers

      public void setMaxPlayers(int maxPlayers)
      Sets the maximum number of players allowed in the game session.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players that can participate in the game session

    • setConnectedPlayers

      public void setConnectedPlayers(Map<String,PlayerColor> connectedPlayers)
      Updates the map of connected players in the game session.
      Parameters:
      connectedPlayers - a map where the keys represent player nicknames (as strings) and the values represent their associated PlayerColor.

    • setStarted

      public void setStarted(boolean started)
      Updates the game session's started status.
      Parameters:
      started - the new started status of the game session. Set to true if the game has started, otherwise false.

    • setTestFlight

      public void setTestFlight(boolean testFlight)
      Sets the test flight status for the game session.
      Parameters:
      testFlight - a boolean indicating whether the test flight mode is enabled (true) or disabled (false)

    • getGameId

      public String getGameId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier for the game session.
      Returns:
      a string representing the unique game identifier.

    • getGameController

      public CallableOnGameController getGameController()
      Retrieves the game controller associated with the game session.
      Returns:
      the instance of CallableOnGameController for managing the actions and interactions related to the game session.

    • getMaxPlayers

      public int getMaxPlayers()
      Retrieves the maximum number of players allowed in this game session.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of players that can join the game.

    • getConnectedPlayersNicknames

      public Set<String> getConnectedPlayersNicknames()
      Retrieves the nicknames of all players currently connected to the game session.
      Returns:
      a set of strings representing the nicknames of the connected players.

    • isTestFlight

      public boolean isTestFlight()
      Checks whether the game session is marked as a test flight.
      Returns:
      true if the game session is a test flight, false otherwise.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Checks if the game session has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game session is in a started state, otherwise false.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks whether the current instance has reached its maximum allowed players.
      Returns:
      true if the number of connected players is greater than or equal to the maximum allowed players, false otherwise.
